name: Muhammad Affan Alif Fajar - Electronic Engineering Technology Student
description: My name is Muhammad Affan Alif Fajar, a graduate of the D4 Electronic Engineering Technology Program at Semarang State Polytechnic, and I am writing to express my interest in the Electronics Engineer position at your company. I have attached my CV and supporting documents for your consideration. I have experience on campus in assembling components and troubleshooting electronics. I am highly motivated to contribute to your team and provide value through my skills and dedication. Thank you for taking the time to review my application. An experienced electro field professional in repair and development with 5 years of experience in the industry Skilled in problem analysis, improvement, and possesses strong communication abilities within a team.Successfully improving industry efficiency in six months, I am committed to bringing significant results for your team.
